data.name: AppDescription
data.value: Corprio Social Worker is a free application software for automating your product advertising and sales order handling

data.name: ConfirmReturnInvoice
data.value: Returning an invoice will create a sales return record and invoiced products will be returned to warehouse automatically. Are you sure to proceed returning this invoice?

data.name: ConfirmVoidInvoice
data.value: Are you sure to void this invoice?

data.name: ConfirmVoidOrder
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel this sales order?

data.name: ConfirmVoidSalesReturn
data.value: Are you sure to void this sales return?

data.name: Feature1Description
data.value: You can manage your orders from customers easily and then process orders, issue and print invoices for your daily operations with minimal faults.

data.name: Feature2Description
data.value: You can simply use the prebuilt report templates or you can add your own fields and adjust the layout with a user-friendly report builder, based on your company’s needs.

data.name: FreeToUseDescription
data.value: You will not be charged for using this app forever. Join Corprio now to get started.

data.name: InvoiceDescription
data.value: Invoices are the confirmed sales of your business. You can search and print the invoices here.

data.name: InvoiceHasBeenVoided
data.value: Cannot perform the required action because the invoice has been voided.

data.name: InvoicePrintReportID_Description
data.value: ID of the report layout used for printing invoices

data.name: InvoicePrintReportID_Warning
data.value: Do not change this unless you have created your own invoice layout

data.name: MsgForOwnerOnly
data.value: Only the organization owner can make changes

data.name: OrderHasBeenVoided
data.value: The sales order has been voided already! It cannot be voided again.

data.name: SalesLocationDescription
data.value: Sales locations are the places where the transactions are taken place. A physical shop is a good example of a sales location.

data.name: SalesOrderDescription
data.value: Sales orders are the buying requests from customers. You should bill your sales orders into invoices when they are delivered or picked up.

data.name: SalesOrderPrintReportID
data.value: Report ID for sales order printout

data.name: SalesOrderPrintReportID_Description
data.value: ID of the report layout used for printing sales orders

data.name: SalesOrderPrintReportID_Warning
data.value: Do not change this unless you have created your own sales order layout

data.name: SalesRepDescription
data.value: Sales reps (sales representatives) are the sales persons who take the order or invoice in charge. When you want to trace an order or calculate commission for a staff, sales rep is helpful for you.

data.name: SalesReturnDescription
data.value: Sales return are records where customers return purchased goods or services.

data.name: SalesReturnHasBeenVoided
data.value: The sales return has been voided already! It cannot be voided again.

data.name: PaymentLinkDesc
data.value: You can share this hyperlink with your customer for making online payment.

data.name: PaymentLinkCopied
data.value: Payment link has been copied to the clipboard!

data.name: SearchInvoiceTips
data.value: Input invoice number, sales order number, customer name, phone, product code or name to search

data.name: SearchOrderTips
data.value: Input sales order number, customer name, phone, product code or name to search

data.name: AppSlogan
data.value:
Manage your Facebook presence
easily and accurately

data.name: SearchReturnTips
data.value: Input sales return number. invoice number, customer name, phone, product code or name to search

data.name: MsgNoApprovePermission
data.value: Sorry, you do not have the "Approve" permission.

data.name: PromptUnapprove
data.value: Are you sure to unapprove this record?

data.name: CataloguePublicationCompletedMessage
data.value: The catalogue was successfully published to your social media.

data.name: ProductImageSpec
data.value: Recommend 480px X 480px png or jpg file

data.name: ProductPublicationCompletedMessage
data.value: The product was successfully published to your social media.

data.name: PublishCatalogueHint
data.value: Publish a post to Facebook and Instagram

data.name: PublishCataloguePrompt
data.value: Do you want to publish this catalogue? A post will be made to your Facebook page(s) and Instagram account(s).

data.name: PublishProductHint
data.value: Publish a post about this product to Facebook and Instagram

data.name: PublishProductPrompt
data.value: The following post will be made to your Facebook page(s) and Instagram account(s). Please review and ensure that the keyword '{0}' is included. The chatbot will automatically reach out to anyone replying to your post with {0}.

data.name: DefaultDeliveryCharge_Description
data.value: The default delivery charge for a product. You can adjust the delivery charge for each product.

data.name: DefaultEmailSubject_Description
data.value: Subject of the confirmation email sent to customer after order placement

data.name: DeliveryChargeProductID_Description
data.value: The product used in sales orders for representing the delivery charge

data.name: EmailToReceiveOrder_Description
data.value: This email address will receive a notification email when you receive a new order. Multiple email addresses can be separated by semi-colon (;).

data.name: ErrMailsToReceiveOrder
data.value: If more than one email addresses is needed, separate email addresses using semi-colon (;) without spaces in between, e.g. ada@mail.com;bob@mail.com

data.name: FB_connected
data.value: Facebook account {0} is now connected with {1}.

data.name: FB_Desc1
data.value: Log in to Facebook to connect

data.name: FB_not_connected
data.value: {0}'s connection with any Facebook account will expire in 60 days until you log in to Facebook again.

data.name: FreeShippingAmountMsg
data.value: If no free shipping policy is applicable, kindly leave this box blank.

data.name: FreeShippingAmount_Description
data.value: Customer can enjoy free shipping if total amount equals or more than this amount.

data.name: InvalidFeedback_KeywordLength
data.value: The keyword must not be blank and consist of up to 10 characters.

data.name: InvalidFeedback_NoKeyword
data.value: Your message should mention the keyword.

data.name: MsgMissingDeliveryChargeProductError
data.value: Please select a product to represent the delivery charge in sales orders.

data.name: MsgSMTPNotSet
data.value: To enable sending emails, you must set up your email account in order to automate sending emails to your customers.

data.name: PaymentMethod_Desc
data.value: Set up methods for receiving payment. These payment methods will be available to your customers when they purchase your products.

data.name: SelfPickUpInstruction_Desc
data.value: Instruction to the customer for how to self pick-up their order. For example, you may include your store's contact and address here.

data.name: SelfPickUp_Desc
data.value: Offer the option for letting customers self pickup their order at your store

data.name: SendConfirmationEmail_Description
data.value: Send a confirmation email to the customer after order is placed

data.name: ShipToCustomer_Desc
data.value: Offer the option for shipping your customer's order to their delivery address

data.name: SocialMediaTemplate_Desc
data.value: Configure templates for social media posts

data.name: SOM_Desc
data.value: Set options for managing sales orders

data.name: Tooltip_Keyword
data.value: When someone replies to the post with the keyword, the chatbot will follow up with that person through private message.

data.name: Tooltip_StandardMessageComponent
data.value: Text within a standard message component will be updated according to the product being published

data.name: WarehouseID_Description
data.value: Use this warehouse for creating new sales orders

data.name: ErrMsg_CustomerNotFound
data.value: The customer could not be found.

data.name: ErrMsg_FailedToGetPages
data.value: Encountered an error in retrieving pages on which {0} has a role.

data.name: ErrMsg_FailedToGetToken
data.value: Failed to obtain long-lived user access token from Facebook.

data.name: ErrMsg_ProductNotFound
data.value: The product could not be found.

data.name: ErrMsg_SalesOrderNotFound
data.value: The sales order could not be found.

data.name: FB_Desc2
data.value: with your Facebook page(s) and Instagram accounts

data.name: ErrMsg_AppSettingNotFound
data.value: The relevant application setting could not be found.

data.name: Advice_FollowPickupInstruction
data.value: Please follow the instructions below to pick up your purchase.

data.name: Advice_NoDeliveryMethod
data.value: {0} did not specify a delivery method. Please contact {0} at {1}.

data.name: Advice_NoPickupInstruction
data.value: {0} did not specify any instruction. Please contact {0} at {1}.

data.name: CannotEdit_PaymentProcessing
data.value: The order cannot be updated because its payment is being processed.

data.name: CannotEdit_VoidedOrPaid
data.value: The order has been voided or paid and therefore cannot be edited.

data.name: ConfirmAddProduct
data.value: Are you sure you want to add new product(s)? This sales order will be voided and you will need to ask the chatbot via Messenger to add new products.

data.name: ConfirmationEmailNotSent
data.value: The confirmation email for order {0} failed to be sent

data.name: DeliveryMethodTBD
data.value: Since delivery method was not configured, the customer was advised to contact the merchant via email.

data.name: EmailNotSentMessage
data.value:
Your customer has input an invalid email address {0}

The order {1} confirmation email failed to be sent.

data.name: ErrMsg_OrganizationInfoNotFound
data.value: The merchant's information could not be found.

data.name: FreeShippingHint2
data.value: Buy {0} more to enjoy free shipping.

data.name: InvalidFeedback_InvalidPhoneNumber
data.value: Please provide a valid phone number.

data.name: InvalidFeedback_Quantity
data.value: Quantity must be a positive number.

data.name: YouReceivedNewOrder
data.value: You have received a new order

data.name: CheckoutPage_Desc
data.value: Configure how the checkout page will appear to your customers.

data.name: ErrMsg_ChatbotNotFound
data.value: We tried to restore this sales order to the chatbot conversing with you but failed. Please confirm if you wish to simply void this order.

data.name: ErrMsg_UnselectedVariations
data.value: The following attributes are not selected yet: {0}.

data.name: ErrMsg_ValidMetaProfileNotFound
data.value: The organization does not have a valid connection with any Facebook account.

data.name: FB_AlreadyConnected
data.value: Facebook account {0} is already connected with another organization. If you want to connect {1} with {0}, please visit

data.name: FB_disconnected
data.value: {0} is no longer connected to any Facebook account.

data.name: Footer_Description
data.value: The footer will be displayed below the shopping cart on checkout page.

data.name: ThankYouMessage
data.value: Message shown in thank you page

data.name: ThankYouMessage_Description
data.value: This message is shown at the top of the thank you page.

data.name: ThankYouPage_Desc
data.value: Define the content that will be displayed to your customer when they finalize their order. This content will be included in the order confirmation email sent to the customer.

data.name: Tour_CheckoutSection_Desc
data.value: When your customer elects to check out, they will be re-directed to a checkout page to review their shopping cart and provide personal information. You can define any message you want to show to your customer at the checkout page.

data.name: Tour_DelliverySection_Desc
data.value: The delivery methods you set up here will be displayed to your customers when they check out.

data.name: Tour_DisconnectFacebook_Desc
data.value: Terminate the connection between your company and Facebook account.

data.name: Tour_FbSection_Desc
data.value: Connect your company with Facebook so that {0} can create posts/stories and respond to private messages / comments on your behalf.

data.name: Tour_GetStarted_Desc
data.value: Complete some simple configurations here to start using {0}.

data.name: Tour_PaymentSection_Desc
data.value: The payment methods you set up here will be made available to your customers when they check out.

data.name: Tour_ProductPublication_Desc
data.value: Once you have connected your company with your Facebook account, you can publish products to your Facebook pages and Instagram accounts.

data.name: Tour_PublishButton_Desc
data.value: Once a product is published, the button's icon would change. You can use it as a reference to tell if you have published this product already.

data.name: Tour_SaveButton_Desc
data.value: Don't forget to click save when you done with configuring {0}.

data.name: Tour_SomSection_Desc
data.value: Once you have connected your company with your Facebook account, a chatbot can handle messages your customers send to your Facebook pages and Instagram accounts. That chatbot will create sales orders according to your settings here.

data.name: Tour_TemplateSection_Desc
data.value: Define how your products/catalogues will be posted to your social media.

data.name: Tour_ThankyouSection_Desc
data.value: Define the thank-you message that you want to display to your customer after they complete checkout.

data.name: Warning_consequence1
data.value: You will not be able to publish products and/or catalogues of the company that is currently linked to Facebook.

data.name: Warning_consequence2
data.value: The chatbot will not be able to handle private messages or comments on behalf of the company that is currently linked to Facebook.

data.name: Warning_consequence3
data.value: Your configurations of social media templates, delivery methods, etc. will be reset to default.

data.name: Warning_DeleteProduct
data.value: You want to delete this product? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: Warning_final
data.value: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: Warning_header2
data.value: Please carefully read the following text before proceeding.

data.name: Warning_para1
data.value: Facebook account (including its Facebook pages and associated Instagram accounts) can only be connected with

data.name: Warning_para2
data.value: Corprio organization at a time. Resetting the connection has the following implications:

data.name: Warning_para3
data.value: You are about to disconnect {0} from your Facebook account. This action cannot be undone and has the following implications:

data.name: AutoReplyComment
data.value: Hello, our chatbot tried to send you a direct message but failed. To proceed with your purchase, please send '{0}' via direct message to our Facebook Page. Thank you. 🤖

data.name: ErrMsg_BlankPostMsg
data.value: Content of the post cannot be blank.

data.name: ErrMsg_InvalidBillPhone
data.value: Please provide a valid phone number for billing.

data.name: ErrMsg_InvalidDeliveryPhone
data.value: Please provide a valid phone number for delivery.

data.name: ErrMsg_NoPaymentMethod
data.value: The merchant has not set up payment method.

data.name: HumanEscalation_EmailBody
data.value:
A customer on {0} Messenger would like to communicate with a human rather than a chatbot. Please refer to below for the customer's particulars and reach out to them accordingly.

  • {0} user name: {1}
  • {0} user ID: {2}
  • Email address: {3}
  • Shopping at: {4} ({0})

data.name: HumanEscalation_EmailSubject
data.value: A {0} customer on {1} Messenger would like to contact you

data.name: PublishProductHint2
data.value: Publish a post about this product to Facebook and Instagram (Note: this product was published previously)

data.name: Tour_PublishCol_Desc
data.value: Select the product you would like to publish and click the corresponding icon in this column.

data.name: Tour_Rerun
data.value: If you wish to have re-run site tour, simply click this button.

data.name: ErrMsg_FacebookNotLoggedIn
data.value: Please make sure you have logged into Facebook.

data.name: PublishProductPrompt2
data.value: The following post will be made to your Facebook page(s) and Instagram account(s). Please review and confirm.

data.name: StoryMention_EmailBody
data.value:
A customer mentioned {0} on Instagram. Please refer to below for details.

  • Instagram user name: {1}
  • Instagram user ID: {2}
  • Instagram story: {1}'s Instagram Story

Note: Instagram story is ephemeral by nature - that is, it will disappear after 24 hours or when deleted by the user - so the link above may no longer be accessible.

data.name: StoryMention_EmailSubject
data.value: A customer mentioned {0} in their Instagram story

data.name: StoryMention_Desc
data.value: See the Instagram stories that have mentioned your Instagram Business account(s).

data.name: StoryMention_hint
data.value: View the story. (Note: Instagram story will disappear after 24 hours or when deleted by the user, so the link above may no longer be accessible.)
